author: lean.green
description: Tip: Recipe makes 5 servings, but casserole can be divided into individual 1 serving portions and freezing for later.
instructions:
Preheat oven to 350*F.
Cook the ground beef. After browning the meat, add the canned Diced tomatoes and seasonings to the ground beef and simmer for 5 minutes.
Place the sliced squash to the bottom of a 9 x 13 inch baking pan.
Place meat mixture on top of squash, sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Bake in preheated oven for about 25 minutes.

title: Healthy Yellow Squash Taco Casserole Recipe
